Row.Text: Ever wanted to toggle the diplomacy ribbon? Now you can! This mod allows you to show or hide the diplomacy ribbon at will, giving you a cleaner interface when you don't need it. [N] -- [N] [B]Features[/B] [B]Diplomacy Ribbon:[/B] Show/Hide the ribbon at will. [N] -- [N] [B]Hotkeys[/B] [B]Toggle:[/B] CTRL-R (default, can be customized) [N] -- [N] [B]SAVED GAMES[/B] [N] This mod does not affect saved games.
